text: The Hyundai Exter is a Crossover SUV made by Hyundai Motor Company since 2023 it was revealed on may 2023. == History and Features == The Hyundai Exter was revealed by Hyundai in 2023 mainly for the Indian market. it has a 1.2 L Kappa II MPI I4 petrol engine and it has both manual and automatic 5 speed transmission. == Markets == The Hyundai Exter is sold mainly in India but it is also sold in South Africa. == References == Category:2020s automobiles Exter Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Hyundai Exter
